content.rendered:
Facilitating Daily Optimal Collaboration Between Employees and Managers.

Outgrid is a specialized platform for managing performance, which is designed to assist your company in achieving its strategic objectives and retaining valuable employees.

Employee performance

A customized management process that drives excellence.
See Details

Organisational alignment

Clear objectives and goal setting provide purpose and direction.
See Detail

Employee performance

People-focused progression planning helps retain talent.
See Detail

Outgrid completed 12,782 performance reviews.

Tailored templates

Create custom templates and cycles for various purposes.

Workflows

Establish simple custom review workflows.

Objectives

Focus conversations outcomes with employee objectives.

Actions

Schedule follow-up actions to keep momentum.
Book a discovery call
  • Best Products 2023
  • Trending Products

Streamline performance management by cutting out admin work.

Let Outgrid take care of scheduling your performance reviews, whether they occur annually, bi-annually, or quarterly. Our automated system can even send reminders on your behalf.

If your business operates on different cycles across departments, don’t worry – we’re flexible enough to accommodate that.

Helps organizations undergo cultural transformation.

Set unambiguous objectives, agree on priorities, and track advancement across your entire organization.
337

Performance reviews and check-ins completed

70

Companies that are embracing 360-degree feedback

321

Business grows together with recharge.

930

Revisions made to goals and individual growth plans.

Your business is one-of-a-kind, and requires a tailored solution.

Designed to fit your requirements.

Give managers the tools and authority to drive employee performance in line with your strategic objectives.

Implemented by your managers.

Outgrid’s straightforward interface provides managers with clear value and encourages proactive behavior.

Regarded as trustworthy by staff.

You need to empower managers to drive employee performance while ensuring alignment to your strategic objectives.

“The data we can get from Outgrid is just so useful for us as a team. It helps us to identify trends, spot areas of strength and things that need attention. We feel that this new approach helps us really make a difference for our people.”

Katie Woods-Ruddick

Chief People Officer, px Group

John Egan

Chief People Officer
The HR process becomes easier with more comprehensive administrative tools and detailed databases

Meghan Roberts

Chief People Officer
Highly beneficial in organizing team productivity.

Melissa Williams

Chief People Officer
Facilitates employee needs for managing attendance, leave, overtime, and shift scheduling

Heidi Trivelpiece

Chief People Officer
The HR process becomes easier with more comprehensive administrative tools and detailed databases
